      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String callNumber,
            java.lang.String iSEBN,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> author,
            int adition)
        The constructor of this class takes 5 parameters and sends one to the super class in order initialize a new Book
        Parameters:
        callNumber - the call number to be pass to the superclass Borrowable
        iSEBN - the ISBN of a Book
        title - the title of a Book
        author - the author of a Book
        adition - the edition of a Book
